alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Northwest Middlesex County; Southeast Middlesex; Western Essex (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 4:32PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Essex and northeastern Middlesex Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 431 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Haverhill to Dracut to near Chelmsford. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. Minor flooding SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Lowell, Lawrence, Haverhill, Peabody, Methuen, Billerica, Beverly, Woburn, Chelmsford, Andover, Dracut, Tewksbury, North Andover, Danvers, Wakefield, Reading, Burlington, Wilmington, Westford and Stoneham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Northwest Middlesex County; Southeast Middlesex; Western Essex
